text: @realDonaldTrump Idk how to explain to someone as selfish as you that mail in votes are vital if you’re gonna close massive amounts of voting places because of Covid-19 (Or so you say) (pretty sure you’re just racist enough to ensure voter suppression in states who have a large # ofPOC residents)
